name: Decisions
tag_list: software, development-platform, saas, cloud-based-software, business-rule-engine-software, intelligent-business-process-management-software, business-process-management-software
overview:
Decisions provides an extensible, graphically configured platform, enabling companies to drastically reduce their time to market for their applications.

In addition to direct client work, Decisions also enters into specific partnerships to deliver applications in a number of market segments. Clients range from small technology start-ups to Fortune 100 companies.

Decisions provides a powerful workflow designer along with a business rules engine, both of which can be deployed on-premise, in the cloud, or in a hybrid model. The rules engine can also be employed as a stand alone service, or embedded within an existing application.
